lead_paragraph: The European Commission said Friday that it would deepen its investigation of the proposed merger of Olympic Air and Aegean Airlines, saying a preliminary inquiry had shown the deal could "raise serious competition concerns."
snippet: The European Commission said Friday that it would deepen its investigation of the proposed merger of Olympic Air and Aegean Airlines, saying a preliminary inquiry had shown the deal could "raise serious competition concerns."

headline.main: Europe Opens Broader Inquiry of Greek Airlines' Merger Plan

abstract: The European Commission said Friday that it would deepen its investigation of the proposed merger of Olympic Air and Aegean Airlines, saying a preliminary inquiry had shown the deal could "raise serious competition concerns."
